amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Weed and Seed crime fighting program by $6 million and reduce funding for the public telecommunications facilities program by the same amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the Weed and Seed program funding by $6 million and reduce the public telecommunications facilities funding by the same amount.

action.text: On agreeing to the Gutknecht amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 136 - 286 (Roll No. 386).
